## Description

## Rough Draft of Content

As a player, I want to know:

- What is the story of the game?
- What real life skills will I learn?
- What are the mechanics?
- Is it fun?
- Singleplayer or multiplayer?
- Runtime? How many puzzles?
- Soundtrack?
- Is it hard? Complex?
- Difficulty curve?
- Rating?

Quick Guide

- | -
--- | ---
Rating | /10
Levels | -
Difficulty | /5
Multiplayer | bool
